title: Create Widget Library UI and Interactive Controls
description: Build the interactive user interface for the widget library and widget controls that integrates with the existing addWidgetFromLibrary and removeWidgetFromDashboard services. This includes creating a widget browser component, add/remove controls that appear on hover/focus, empty state guidance for first-time users, and proper accessibility patterns. Acceptance criteria: Interactive widget library displays all 5 available widget types with descriptions, users can add widgets via the browser interface, widgets show remove/edit controls on hover/focus, empty state guides users to add first widget, all interactions are accessible and keyboard-navigable, UI integrates seamlessly with existing dashboard-service.ts functions.
